description: From un- +‎ polite. Compare earlier unpolished.

adjectives.description: unpolite (comparative more unpolite, superlative most unpolite)

entries.meaning: (obsolete) Unsophisticated, not refined; coarse, uncultured. [17th–20th c.]
(now chiefly Canada, US) Lacking in good manners; impolite, discourteous. [from 17th c.]
